metadata.title: CVE-2018-20539 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: There is a Segmentation fault triggered by illegal address access atliblas::SpatialReference::GetGTIF() (spatialreference.cpp) in libLAS 1.8.1that will cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: liblas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
